name: Spaghetti Carbonara
instructions: Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil.
Cook the spaghetti until al dente.
Meanwhile, in a large skillet, cook the pancetta over medium heat until crisp.
In a large bowl, whisk together the eggs, Parmesan, and Pecorino.
When the pasta is done, reserve 1 cup of the pasta cooking water.
Drain the pasta and immediately add it to the skillet with the pancetta.
Remove the skillet from the heat and let it cool for 1-2 minutes.
Add the egg and cheese mixture to the skillet and toss until the pasta is coated.
If the pasta seems dry, add a little of the reserved cooking water.
Season with salt and pepper to taste.

name: Margherita Pizza
instructions: Preheat the oven to 450째F.
Stretch the pizza dough out to a 12-inch circle and place it on a baking sheet or pizza stone.
Spread the tomato sauce evenly over the dough, leaving a 1-inch border around the edge.
Slice the mozzarella and arrange it on top of the sauce.
Drizzle with olive oil and season with salt and pepper to taste.
Bake for 12-15 minutes, or until the crust is golden brown and the cheese is melted and bubbly.
Garnish with fresh basil leaves and serve hot.

name: Chicken Fajitas
instructions: Slice the chicken breasts into thin strips.
Heat 1 tablespoon of olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat.
Add the chicken strips and cook for 5-7 minutes, or until cooked through.
Remove the chicken from the skillet and set aside.
Add the remaining tablespoon of olive oil to the skillet.
Add the sliced bell peppers and onion to the skillet and cook for 5-7 minutes, or until softened.
Add the taco seasoning to the skillet and stir to combine.
Return the chicken to the skillet and toss with the vegetables and seasoning.
Warm the flour tortillas according to package instructions.
Assemble the fajitas by placing a spoonful of the chicken and vegetable mixture onto a tortilla.
Top with a dollop of sour cream, a sprinkle of shredded cheddar cheese, a spoonful of salsa, and a dollop of guacamole.
Fold the tortilla in half and serve immediately.

name: Lasagna
instructions: Preheat oven to 375째F.
Cook the lasagna noodles according to package instructions, and set aside.
In a large skillet over medium-high heat, cook the ground beef, sausage, onion, and garlic until browned.
Drain any excess fat, then add the diced tomatoes, tomato paste, and fresh basil to the skillet.
Simmer for 10-15 minutes, or until the sauce has thickened.
In a separate bowl, mix together the ricotta cheese, mozzarella cheese, Parmesan cheese, eggs, salt, and pepper.
To assemble the lasagna, spread a layer of the meat sauce in the bottom of a 9x13 inch baking dish.
Add a layer of lasagna noodles, then a layer of the cheese mixture.
Repeat layers until all ingredients are used up, ending with a layer of meat sauce on top.
Cover with aluminum foil and bake for 25 minutes.
Remove the foil and bake for an additional 25 minutes, or until the cheese is melted and bubbly.
Let cool for 10 minutes before serving.

title: Roasted Brussel Sprouts with Balsamic Glaze
instructions: Preheat oven to 400째F.
Trim the ends off the Brussel sprouts and remove any yellow leaves.
Cut the sprouts in half and place them in a bowl.
In a separate bowl, whisk together the olive oil, balsamic vinegar, honey, salt, and pepper.
Pour the mixture over the Brussel sprouts and toss to coat.
Spread the Brussel sprouts out on a baking sheet in a single layer.
Roast for 20-25 minutes, stirring halfway through, or until the sprouts are tender and caramelized.
Serve hot and enjoy!

name: Chocolate Chip Cookies
instructions: Preheat the oven to 375째F.
In a medium bowl, whisk together the flour, baking soda, and salt.
In a large bowl, beat the butter, granulated sugar, brown sugar, and vanilla extract together until creamy.
Add the eggs one at a time, beating well after each addition.
Gradually beat in the flour mixture.
Stir in the chocolate chips.
Drop rounded tablespoonfuls of dough onto ungreased baking sheets.
Bake for 10-12 minutes, or until golden brown.
Cool on the baking sheets for 2 minutes before transferring to wire racks to cool completely.
